phishing_bank_kyc.text: Dear Customer, Your SBI account will be blocked due to incomplete KYC. Update immediately: http://sbi-kyc-update.xyz/verify. Do not ignore this message.

upi_collect_fraud.text: Hi, I have sent Rs 5000 to your account. Please accept the collect request on GPay to receive the money. UPI: merchant@ybl

lottery_prize_scam.text: CONGRATULATIONS! You have won Rs 25,00,000 in the WhatsApp Lucky Draw 2026! To claim your prize, pay Rs 2500 processing fee to this account: winner@paytm. Claim within 24 hours or prize will be forfeited!

job_scam_upfront_fee.text: Congratulations! You have been selected for a Data Entry position at Google. Salary: Rs 85,000/month. To confirm your joining, please pay Rs 5,000 registration fee to our HR department. Contact: hr.google.jobs@gmail.com

investment_scam.text: Join our exclusive Forex trading group! Guaranteed 50% returns every month. Minimum investment Rs 10,000. Send to 0x742d35Cc6634C0532925a3b844Bc9e7595f2bD38. Limited spots available â€” act NOW!

tech_support_scam.text: WARNING: Your computer has been infected with 3 viruses! Call Microsoft Support immediately at +1-888-555-0199 to avoid data loss. Your Windows license will expire in 24 hours.

otp_fraud.text: This is SBI Bank. We are updating our system. Please share the OTP sent to your registered mobile number for account verification. This is urgent.

delivery_scam.text: Your Amazon package #AZ-4823 could not be delivered. Pay customs duty of Rs 299 to receive it: https://amaz0n-delivery.tk/pay

legitimate_marketing.text: Big Bazaar Sale! Up to 50% off on groceries this weekend. Visit your nearest store or order on bigbazaar.com. T&C apply.

benign_personal_message.text: Hey, are we still meeting for dinner at 7pm tonight? Let me know if you want to change the restaurant.

edge_case_empty_entities.text: Something doesn't feel right about this situation. Be careful.

edge_case_mixed_signals.text: Your Flipkart order has been shipped! Track here: https://www.flipkart.com/track/OD12345. Delivery expected by tomorrow.
